# Membership

How we think about membership. Value in heterogeneity.

In order to make the space as accessible as possible, I try to charge folks as little as possible while providing maximal flexibility.

# Directory

This would be a great place for a Vue component.

# Terms

  • You can begin your membership whenever you’re ready—just let us know what day.
  • Your membership fee covers the subsequent month of access.
  • Membership is month-to-month—there’s no commitment.
  • To cancel, just let us know prior to the start of the next billing cycle. (If you provide more than 30 days notice, we’ll pro-rate the balance in the event that your planning to depart mid-cycle.)
  • We don't support pausing a membership. (In order to keep our prices as low as possible for everyone, we need confidence in our recurring cash flow. Otherwise we’d have to price in the risk and raise rates.)
  • If you run into a rough patch, or if the nature of your work changes let's talk about it and we'll figure something out.
  • There are no initiation or closing fees.
  • If you lose your keys, please tell me

# Refer a New Member

  • bring them to show and tell
  • invite them to work out of the space
  • share our pricing info
